references.paper_title: Multiterminal source coding with an entropy-based distortion measure
references.reason: This paper introduces an entropy-based distortion measure into the multiterminal source coding framework, a key concept extended in the current work.

references.paper_title: Multiterminal source coding under logarithmic loss
references.reason: This paper explores the use of logarithmic loss in multiterminal source coding, providing a theoretical foundation for the loss function used in the current work.

references.paper_title: A single-shot approach to lossy source coding under logarithmic loss
references.reason: This paper offers a single-shot approach to lossy source coding under logarithmic loss, which is a related problem to the one considered in this work.

references.paper_title: A metric between probability distributions on finite sets of different cardinalities and applications to order reduction
references.reason: This paper introduces a metric between probability distributions, which is highly relevant to the minimum entropy coupling problem addressed in this paper.
